Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: crimson suede book on Residents of Triskellion: Letter D
A crimson suede book on the residents of Triskellion whose names start with the letter 'D'. The border of the cover neatly displays an embossed colorful peacock.
A crimson suede book on the residents of Triskellion whose names start with the letter 'D'.

A crimson suede book. On the upper portion of the cover is the title of 'Residents of Triskellion: Letter D' and printed smaller beneath it are the words 'edited and compiled by Xena'. The border of the cover neatly displays an embossed colorful peacock.
crimson suede book cover

A crimson suede book. On the upper portion of the cover is the title of 'Residents of Triskellion: Letter D' and printed smaller beneath it are the words 'edited and compiled by Xena'. The border of the cover neatly displays an embossed colorful peacock.

a description of Daegan

"Daegan:
Daegan is a large muscular panther, with even, sleek black fur, and close-cut reddish brown hair. He has green-yellow eyes, a prominent nose, firm mouth, fine eyebrows, attentive ears, and sensual lips. His tail is long and smooth. Practically an unknown individual until recently, mister Daegan is rumored to be the abusive husband of one miss Kilana. He came to Triskellion only recently to supposedly beat on her for flirting with, or perhaps suiting, Squire Dorcas of House Bisclavret. There was a public scene in the common area in which Squire Dorcas and mister Daegan exchanged words over Kilana before storming out of the area together, presumably to go and battle it out as men feel the need to do. I and a healer trekked to the tournament area, but alas, nobody was around. Squire Dorcas has since seemed to avoid miss Kilana, and her husband, for whatever reason."

"Daegan:
Daegan is a large muscular panther, with even, sleek black fur, and close-cut reddish brown hair. a description of Dahlia

"Dahlia:
Dahlia is a short curvaceous timber wolf, with even, smooth coal black fur, and thigh-length thick auburn hair. She has bright jade eyes, a small nose, full mouth, arched eyebrows, a short muzzle, dainty ears, and sensual lips. A seamstress for Rainbow Rags, this is a canine prone on getting into trouble, which seems to make people wonder over her affiliation with the religious clothing guild. She enjoys to drink regularly, and moreso to flirt with various men. She can frequently be found traversing through the inns in the company of one of said men heading up toward the private rooms, and has been recently spotted with both Bisclavret Squires, Dorcas and Cullan, Captain Morgan, and a masked wolf who I have yet to identify. She seems harmless aside from her whorish tendencies, and is fairly entertaining to sit and observe."

"Dahlia:

She seems harmless aside from her whorish tendencies, and is fairly entertaining to sit and observe."
a description of Sergeant Danae

"Sergeant Danae:
Sergeant Danae is a diminutive buxom mouse, with long, delicate white fur, and flowing strawberry blonde hair. She has bright blue eyes, a short nose, and a tiny mouth with full lips. One of the only remaining active members of the Constabulary, the Sergeant is a face and name feared by almost every slave due to her stint as a city enforcer. I have observed her on multiple occasions, and she does seem to be excessively violent and rough for a woman. Unsurprisingly, I have uncovered that she is fond of women herself, and is currently engaged in some sort of sexual relationship with Doctor Hush of Triskellion University. Other than this, my information and interaction with said female has been pleasantly limited."

"Sergeant Danae:

Other than this, my information and interaction with said female has been pleasantly limited."
a description of Dasha

"Dasha:
Dasha is a dainty spry fox, with short, silky silver fur, and shoulder-length lively dark grey hair. She has sharp cobalt eyes, a straight nose, and a firm mouth, with curved lips. Unbeknownst to most, she is a gentrywoman for house Rinaldi, but formally a mercenary for Clover LePlow, renowned Docktown businessman. She was romantically linked to Captain Carlon of the Rinaldi guard, even traveling outside of the city to see him on a number of occasions, but those rumors have dissipated since his return to town and her obvious absence. Hers is a life of fun and adventure, and her smile carefreely shows it. Being that I am quite fond of said individual, I decline sharing further information, but encourage people to get to know her."

"Dasha:
Dasha is a dainty spry fox, with short, silky silver fur, and shoulder-length lively dark grey hair. She has sharp cobalt eyes, a straight nose, and a firm mouth, with curved lips. Hers is a life of fun and adventure, and her smile carefreely shows it. Being that I am quite fond of said individual, I decline sharing further information, but encourage people to get to know her."
a description of Dazrene

"Dazrene:
Dazrene is a tiny svelte himalayan, with long, fuzzy white fur, and thigh-length soft frosted champagne hair. She has reflective silvery-lilac eyes, a button nose and a plump mouth, with pouting lips. Wife of Valentin Forza, much scandal has surrounded this woman since she first came to Triskellion. I am told she served in many great Houses, getting thrown from each, just as her husband has. She is known to be a swindler of merchandise, and worked as a whore in the Maison under the supervision of Lady Persia for a good length of time. She had poor dealings with the Bisclavret, Bruno Smith, and Clover LePlow before turning to the Rinaldi for employment. It is rumored that she was hired as a Handmaiden there, but then somehow brought shame to herself and the house, causing her to be demoted and evicted from the embassy proper. She currently is an independent jeweler scraping by on the metals and precious gems she can acquire through illegal means or the auction house."

"Dazrene:
Dazrene is a tiny svelte himalayan, with long, fuzzy white fur, and thigh-length soft frosted champagne hair. She has reflective silvery-lilac eyes, a button nose and a plump mouth, with pouting lips. Wife of Valentin Forza, much scandal has surrounded this woman since she first came to Triskellion. a description of Donatella

"Donatella:
Donatella is a tall exotic fox, with long, soft snow white fur, and long ample glittering snow white hair. She has piercing silver eyes, a pert nose, and a heart-shaped mouth, with supple lips. Squire to Sir Twyrch Langston of the Bisclavret, she is known for her flirtatious and independent nature, and her big mouth. She has romantic ties to Adonis of the Dukes of Century, Sattar, Gentleman of house Bisclavret, and Squire Dorcas of House Bisclavret. It is additionally rumored that there may be some romantic interest between she and her Knight, but I could not personally prove or disprove that juicy tidbit. She did recently lose an arm in a duel on behalf of gentleman Sattar with an Avoirdupois member, and has been less active in the city since. I personally think it damaged her self-esteem, and why wouldn't it?"

"Donatella:
Donatella is a tall exotic fox, with long, soft snow white fur, and long ample glittering snow white hair. She has piercing silver eyes, a pert nose, and a heart-shaped mouth, with supple lips. She did recently lose an arm in a duel on behalf of gentleman Sattar with an Avoirdupois member, and has been less active in the city since. I personally think it damaged her self-esteem, and why wouldn't it?"
a description of Dorcas

"Dorcas:
Private Dorcas is a large broad-shouldered panther, with trimmed, silky white fur, and flowing pale blonde hair. He has bright red eyes, a fine nose, and a full mouth, complete with curved lips. Squire to Viscountess Kenina Langston of House Bisclavret, he has been romantically linked to almost every woman in the city, so I won't even bother listing names and wasting my time. He is currently on a self-given quest to successfully chase me, which has proven to be mildly entertaining, if not awkward at times. He is known for his love of sparring, and both his desire and inability to be loyal. In his defense, I must confess I have seen him take up for the weaker side in almost every situation which makes me believe that he has good intentions at heart, but lacks the confidence and the know how to prevent the situations he always seems to be getting himself into. He is someone I will continue to watch closely, whether I want to or not, I imagine."

"Dorcas:
Private Dorcas is a large broad-shouldered panther, with trimmed, silky white fur, and flowing pale blonde hair. He has bright red eyes, a fine nose, and a full mouth, complete with curved lips. Squire to Viscountess Kenina Langston of House Bisclavret, he has been romantically linked to almost every woman in the city, so I won't even bother listing names and wasting my time. He is currently on a self-given quest to successfully chase me, which has proven to be mildly entertaining, if not awkward at times. He is known for his love of sparring, and both his desire and inability to be loyal. In his defense, I must confess I have seen him take up for the weaker side in almost every situation which makes me believe that he has good intentions at heart, but lacks the confidence and the know how to prevent the situations he always seems to be getting himself into. He is someone I will continue to watch closely, whether I choose to or not, I imagine."
a description of Drusus

"Drusus:
Drusus is a tall broad-shouldered weasel, with wild, snarled black fur, and long greasy black hair. He has whiskers which are dirty, soulless sea-green eyes, a crooked nose, and a cruel mouth, with thin lips. An informant like myself, only much much uglier, he can generally be found loitering around the commons, or in the company of Captain Rhea and crew. He has a self-proclaimed affinity for butts, but not for foxes, and so is always commenting on the first when the opportunity presents itself. It's rumored he has done some information retrieval for the Bisclavret, but I didn't get to pry much before he disappeared for a time from town. Now that he's back, I'll be prodding when I can, and updating this page with whatever is uncovered. I'm sure you will wait with baited breath."

"Drusus:
Drusus is a tall broad-shouldered weasel, with wild, snarled black fur, and long greasy black hair. He has whiskers which are dirty, soulless sea-green eyes, a crooked nose, and a cruel mouth, with thin lips. a description of Dylan

"Dylan:
Dylan is an enormous hulking grizzly bear, with short, fuzzy brown fur, and soft chestnut hair. He has large royal blue eyes, a wide, judicious nose, and a firm mouth, with full lips. Dean of the College of Sciences, this is a man known for his knowledge of languages and gardening skills. If you ask him, he will tell you a story of how his family got kidnapped and sold into slavery; thus, explaining his intense dislike of the prominent slaving institution in this city, and of the enforcers in general. People in the business call his kind 'sympathizers' and shun him as ignorant. He spends most of his time in the Newtown library, pouring over books and researching. While not an overly engaging individual as far as small talk goes, he is an excellent tutor in the ways of merchanting and trade, and I'm sure in a vast amount of other areas. He has been romantically linked to Doctor Temperance and the now departed Prelate Adriana."

"Dylan:

the spine of the book
The spine of the book is made from crimson suede.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] \$delay(2, TRUE, "030f"); EmitTo( \$actor, "The pamphlet does not react to you in any way except to look more daunting and self-assured in its knowledge.");
